Michael's favorite programming language lately includes:

Clojure

(require '[clojure.string :as clo-str])

(def msg 
    ((fn [x] (clo-str/join x)) ["H" "e" "l" "l" "o" " " "W" "o" "r" "l" "d" "!"]))

(println msg)
;; => Hello World!

TypeScript

function main() {
    console.log("Hello world!");
}
